price: (Muhammad-SAW) ni jedhe: “Gooftaan kiyya jecha samiifi dachii keessatti (dubbatamu hunda) ni beeka. Innis dhaga’aa, beekaadha.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّي يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbī yaʿlamu al-qawla fī al-samāi wal-arḍi wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
